snippet: The suspect, Jesús Leonel Sánchez Meza, is one of five men charged with killing Brian A. Terry in December 2010 during a shootout in Arizona near the Mexico border.
lead_paragraph: The suspect, Jesús Leonel Sánchez Meza, is one of five men charged with killing Brian A. Terry in December 2010 during a shootout in Arizona near the Mexico border.

headline.seo: Mexico Holds Suspect in Death of U.S. Border Patrol Agent
headline.main: Mexico Holds Suspect in Death of U.S. Border Officer
headline.print_headline: Mexico Holds Suspect in Death of U.S. Border Officer
